column4: come on, how come NOBODY here knows about apt-get verification errors?!
are you using unofficail repos?
i dont think so, how do I get a list of the repos?
what repo is it erroring on?
i cant say.. i just did this: http://www.rafb.net/paste/results/8Uhft976.html and i got a warning
apt-cache policy xchat
nickrud ok , says dapper/universe
please give me the full repo at teh bottom you will see one or 2 if 2 i need both
http://us.archive.ubuntu.com dapper/universe Packages
yes 6.06 dapper
/var/lib/dpkg/status
ok good im gonna give you a command to run real fast ok
sudo sed -i 's/us\.//g' /etc/apt/sources.list
run that command please let me know when its done
all the sites changed from http://us.archive.... to http://archive ?
now run sudo apt-get update
all right let me run that sed command first, heh
ok
ok its runnig the update now
how do i tell if it did anything? it just read 17 repos
now install xchat
hmm i already installed that, im on xchat right now
